title: HealthHub Medical Platform
description: Telemedicine platform revolutionizing patient care with AI-powered diagnostics and seamless doctor consultations.
challenge: HealthHub needed a HIPAA-compliant telemedicine platform that could handle video consultations, prescription management, and health records while being accessible to elderly patients and those with limited tech experience.
solution: We created an intuitive platform with one-click video consultations, AI symptom checker, and integrated pharmacy network. The design uses calming colors, large touch targets, and voice navigation options for accessibility.
results: Average consultation wait time reduced to 5 minutes
Reduced healthcare costs by 40% for partner clinics
FDA approval for AI diagnostic assistant
